casebody.data:
No. 203,

Misc.

Baumet et al. v. United States et al. Petitioners pro se. Solicitor General Perlman filed a memorandum for the *926United States, respondent, stating that the Government does not oppose the granting of a writ of certiorari in this case. George G. Gallantz for Peters, Executrix, respondent.

*925C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari granted.
